ygData.subject: Scenario Converter Progress
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Sorry about the break in updates, I ve got a few projects running at the same time along with some other things (ok ok those other things are just playing

Hi,
Sorry about the break in updates, I've got a few projects running at the
same time along with some other things (ok ok those other things are just
playing games :) so the project I'm working on shifts, usually randomly,
every few days.

For now though I've added in the ability to write out a scenario file, the
file on my site hasn't been updated (since the other half - reading the text
file - isn't complete).
I did a couple of tests, fixed a bug (Fun with pointers #1035...) and now it
looks like the file that comes out is different only in the 'junk'
characters that fill space in the unused portions of strings.  The problem
with that is I can't run an automated file comparison program over it :)
So what I would like are some people to suggest files I should convert to
test, and I'll run them through and put them up on my site so they can be
checked.

Right now I ran through a few of DPH's torture scenario's (I know they are
all V8 :) and those are up at www.twarriors.com/deathifier with the filename
GSCTest.zip and they looked fine to me.
Inside the zip file is some information, and you will need the PIX files
from the torture pack to play and test them.
If you find any discrepancies please let me know, if people don't want to
wait for me to test them I can modify the program a little so you can
convert scenario file to scenario file temporarily yourself and do whatever
you want.

Once this part is verified to work properly I'll do the last 1/4, hopefully
in the next couple of days (uni is going back so it could be a few more) and
then it'll be complete :)

Cya's,
Deathifier
